mergeResults.content: Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven; offered support; confirmed Healers would care for Rance.

Talia's Companion, Queen's Own Companion. Centuries-old perspective. Greeted Senta at Haven; offered support; confirmed Healers would care for Rance. Attended Circle meeting without his Chosen; positioned beside Rance throughout report—presence lent legitimacy to extraordinary claims. Assessment suggests grave concern tempered with hope. STANCE-Rance: monitoring; appears to endorse despite unprecedented circumstances.
